instance.name: Jafner.net
instance.short_description: A personal PeerTube instance for serving miscellaneous content without making the compromises YouTube demands.
instance.description:
Welcome to Jafner.net's PeerTube instance!
This site is a platform for sharing miscellaneous content quickly and easily without dealing with the myriad inconveniences and compromises of YouTube.
instance.terms: Adhere to all relevant legal codes in the U.S. and your home country.
instance.creation_reason: I create this PeerTube instance to provide myself and my friends with a platform for sharing videos (mostly gaming highlights) without compromising quality.
instance.moderation_information: This instance is moderated by me, its owner and maintainer.
instance.administrator: My name is Joey Hafner and I am an avid homelabber.
instance.maintenance_lifetime: I will maintain this instance as long as it is useful to me or my friends.
instance.business_model: I own the hardware on which this instance is hosted, and all upgrades come out of my pocket.
instance.hardware_information:
This instance runs inside a Docker container on a host featuring:

* AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
* 16GB DDR4-3000 
* 512GB SanDisk SSD
